p: Diabetes is a major endocrine health problem that has a fast-developing rate around the world. Diabetic patients are anticipated to increase in numbers to 300 million by 2025 according to the World Health Organization (WHO). The Middle Eastern and North African regions have the second highest rates of increase in diabetes globally, with the number of people with diabetes projected to increase by 96.2% in 2035, increasing the social and economic burden of many countries [ 1, 2, 3].
